meanings.definition: A remote sensing method that uses light in the form of a pulsed laser to measure variable distances to the Earth.
meanings.sent1: The lidar helped scientists map the terrain accurately.
meanings.sent2: The lidar system on the drone provided detailed topographic data.
meanings.sent3: The lidar device had a funny beep whenever it detected an obstacle.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like lidar, scanning the room for any signs of trouble.
meanings.sent5: The lidar technology revealed hidden features of the landscape with precision.
